titles.title: A bill to amend the Safe Drinking Water Act to clarify the definition of the term "underground injection".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 4/18/2005--Introduced. Amends the Safe Drinking Water Act to exclude from the definition of "underground injection" (the subsurface emplacement of fluids by well injection) the underground injection of fluids or propping agents pursuant to hydraulic fracturing operations related to oil or gas production activities.
